snippet: The economists charged with making the determination say it’s unclear if the economy is expanding or merely taking a pause.
abstract: The Upshot; uncertainty about whether European economy is expanding or whether it is in recession shows why economic situation is so perilous in Europe; part of hesitation by economists charged with determining whether recession has ended stems from fear that policy makers may not be sufficiently concerned about state of the economy.
lead_paragraph: The economists charged with making the determination say it’s unclear if the economy is expanding or merely taking a pause.

headline.main: Europe May Be in a Recession (Still)
headline.print_headline: The Recession in Europe May Not Yet Be Over, Economists Say
